description: Simulated NISAR products are specialized UAVSAR PolSAR products. They include files described in the UAVSAR PolSAR Data Format but with different number of MLC looks and GRD grid; as well as additional NISAR RSLC HDF5 files, radiometric terrain correction layer, and flat earth incidence angle files.

links.title: Simulated NISAR Products documentation
links.description: Simulated NISAR products are generated from UAVSAR data to emulate NISAR data characteristics in order to help users test their algorithms and get a sense of the quality of future NISAR products. Click on the links below to go to the desired section.

RRSD.title: Radar Raw Signal Data and Calibration

RSLC.title: Range Doppler Single Look Complex
RSLC.description: Level 1 Focused SAR image in range-doppler coordinates (zero-doppler steered)

RIFG.title: Range Doppler Wrapped Interferogram
RIFG.description: Level 1 Phase-wrapped interferogram in range-doppler coordinates (zero-doppler steered)

RUNW.title: Range Doppler UnWrapped Interferogram
RUNW.description: Level 1 Phase-unwrapped interferogram in range-doppler coordinates (zero-doppler steered)

ROFF.title: Range Doppler Pixel Offsets
ROFF.description: Level 1 Pixel offsets in range-doppler coordinates (zero-doppler steered)

GSLC.title: Geocoded Single Look Complex
GSLC.description: Level 2 Focused SAR image in geocoded coordinates

GUNW.title: Geocoded Unwrapped Interferogram
GUNW.description: Level 2 Phase-unwrapped interferogram in geocoded coordinates

GOFF.title: Geocoded Pixel Offsets
GOFF.description: Level 2 Pixel offsets in geocoded coordinates

GCOV.title: Geocoded Polarimetric Covariance
GCOV.description: Level 2 SAR covariance product in geocoded coordinates

title: Simulated NISAR
